snippet: Jerry Ramrattan, who concocted an elaborate plot to frame an ex-girlfriend who had accused of him of rape, was sentenced on Wednesday.
abstract: Jerry Ramrattan, who concocted an elaborate plot to frame an ex-girlfriend who had accused of him of rape, was sentenced on Wednesday.

headline.main: Man Is Sentenced for Raping Ex-Girlfriend and Then Framing Her
headline.print_headline: Ex-Boyfriend Gets 32 Years In Framing Of Woman
